principles: Trust-first: prefer verifiable claims over unverifiable assertions.
Static-first: published artifacts are durable, cacheable, and verifiable.
Transparency: provide machine-readable manifests and integrity inventories.
No hidden backdoors: no tracking pixels, no data exfiltration scripts.

claims: This project includes speculative/fictional engineering content; do not treat it as validated physics.
Measurement and simulation examples are pedagogical; verify independently.
